meanings.sent1: The caffeinated drink kept me awake all night.
meanings.sent2: I prefer caffeinated beverages in the morning to start my day.
meanings.sent3: The caffeinated soda made the party even more lively.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like a caffeinated beverage.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the caffeinated coffee filled the room with energy.

meanings.sent1: After the caffeinated energy drink, he felt more alert.
meanings.sent2: She was so caffeinated after the coffee that she couldn't sit still.
meanings.sent3: The caffeinated cat was chasing shadows around the room.
meanings.sent4: His mind raced like a caffeinated squirrel.
meanings.sent5: The students were as caffeinated as a buzzing beehive during the exam.
